CWEs: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
description: The function checkGraphvizInstalled is vulnerable to OS command injection. The function uses the exec function to execute a command that is constructed by joining the user-supplied input (config.graphVizPath) with a static string. If an attacker can control the value of config.graphVizPath, they can inject arbitrary commands to be executed by the system.
